title: Artexpo New York | DECOR Expo Showcase 2016 — VIP/Trade
desc: ARTEXPO NEW YORK | [SOLO] | DECOR 2016  APRIL 14?17, 2016  PIER 94 | NYC Each year thousands of art industry insiders flock to Artexpo New York in search of the art and artists that will shape trends in galleries worldwide. Hosting more than 25,000 avid art enthusiasts annually, we?re the largest international gathering of qualified trade buyers?including gallery owners and managers, art dealers, interior designers, architects, corporate art buyers and art & framing retailers. THREE SHOWS IN ONE VENUE Artexpo New York 2016 will be held at Pier 94, in conjunction with  [SOLO]  and  DECOR Expo Showcase . We look forward to hosting you for a weekend of fine art, design and framing! Browse thousands of innovative new works of art and enjoy state-of-the-art education seminars, cocktail parties, live entertainment and other events. Trade attendees must bring the following identification to Artexpo New York/DECOR Expo Showcase: ? Personalized business card (with company and employee name) ? Photo ID OPENING NIGHT VIP PREVIEW PARTY    Thursday, April 14th,? 4pm ? 7pm COMPLETE SHOW HOURS    Thursday, April 14th:?12pm?4pm (TRADE ONLY) Friday, April 15th: 12pm?7pm  Saturday, April 16th: ?  12pm?7pm  Sunday, April 17th: 12pm?6pm SHOW ADDRESS Pier 94 711 12th Ave (55th Street & the?West Side Highway) New York, NY 10019-5399 AENY Facebook :  www.facebook.com/artexponewyork   AENY16 :  www.artexponewyork.com DECOR Facebook :  www.facebook.com/DecorExpoNewYork   DECOR16 :  www.decorexponewyork.com
